description:
Ho ho ho!
Feel the Christmas spirit and enjoy yourself with this limited-time DLC treat. Unlock the Porsche 911 Targa 4S, the Mercedes-Benz AMG GT S and the Dodge Viper ACR, plus a load of resources to accelerate and boost your drive to become a Legend!

This pack contains:
- 35 Blueprints to unlock the Dodge Viper ACR
- 30 Blueprints to unlock the Mercedes-Benz AMG GT S
- 30 Blueprints to unlock the Porsche 911 Targa 4S
- 220,220 Credits
- 220 Tokens
name: Asphalt 9: Legends -- Christmas Pack
